title: Emma
description: Emma Lucas is a secretary at Lucas's Private Investigations, her brothers PI firm. Also working for her brother is Alec, the hottest man she has ever laid eyes on. Which makes it a little embarrassing at times when she tries to flirt with him, without any luck so far. Fortunately Alec is away a lot in his work making the embarrassment easier to handle. But when Emma ends up with a stalker Alec cuts one of his trips short to help keep Emma safe. And Emma sees an opportunity to finally find out if Alec sees her as anything more than Brodyâ€™s little sister.
author: M.L. Gyllenberg
